text: Avoid using lead-based paint as this could prove poisonous if junior decides to bite the chair. Finally, it is as well to cover the footrest with rubber or any such protective material that might be available as otherwise the paint would soon be scratched off. J.H.P.) BUILDING your own boat is a most satisfying and worthwhile project.
handwritten_text: Avoid using lead-based paint as this could prove poisonous if junior decides to bite the chair. Finally, it is as well to cover the footrest with rubber or any such protective material that might be available as otherwise the paint would soon be scratched off. J.H.P.) BUILDING your own boat is a most satisfying and worthwhile project.
